title: 再帰関数3
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdlib.h></color>

<color=#358cd6>long</color> <color=#358cd6>long</color> power<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#358cd6>int</color> a,<color=#358cd6>int</color> n<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#c586c0>if</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>n == 0<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
    <color=#c586c0>return</color> 1;
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>
  <color=#358cd6>long</color> <color=#358cd6>long</color> b;
  b = <color=#ff0000>???</color>;
  b *= b;
  <color=#c586c0>if</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>n % 2 == 1<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
    b *= a;
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> b;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>
<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%I64d"</color>,power<color=#ffd700>(</color>2,10<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> 0;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
